name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-msgext-search-csharp
title: Search Based Messaging Extension
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates how to create a C# Messaging Extension in Microsoft Teams that allows users to perform searches and retrieve results.
longDescription: This C# sample illustrates the development of a search-based Messaging Extension for Microsoft Teams, enabling users to search for information directly within their Teams environment. It showcases how to handle search commands and interact with the Bot Framework for seamless user experience.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing search based messaging extension

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
